title: Document the Default Connection and Default Inheritance feature
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
Create a User Manual page describing how to set Default Connection properties and Default Inheritance properties. Also include how they are used throughout the application (creating new connections, importing, quick connection, etc).

## Context
<!--- How has this issue affected you? What are you trying to accomplish? -->
<!--- Providing context helps us come up with a solution that is most useful in the real world -->
A number of users have had questions that relate to default connection p...

iterations.description: Documentation is required to explain the Default Connection and Default Inheritance features, which are core to how connection properties propagate.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Documentation is required to explain the Default Connection and Default Inheritance features, which are core to how connection properties propagate.
Approach: Update documentation to describe how the Default Connection node functions as a template and how inheritance works for folders and connections.
